(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP (NNS Sen028)))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ video) (NN upload)))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, to-2)
pobj(to-2, Sen028-3)
prep(Thanks-1, for-4)
det(upload-7, the-5)
amod(upload-7, video-6)
pobj(for-4, upload-7)
